Software Architecture.title: What are the stages of the IT architecture project?
Software Architecture.text: Our approach includes requirements analysis, solution design, technology selection, pilot implementation, and comprehensive documentation.

Software Architecture.title: How do you ensure the scalability of the architecture?
Software Architecture.text: We utilize modular architecture principles, load balancing, and growth forecasting to ensure your infrastructure grows with your business.

Software Architecture.title: What certifications does your team have?
Software Architecture.text: Our architects have AWS, Azure, TOGAF, and ITIL certifications, ensuring solutions aligned with market best practices.

IT Consulting.title: What is the average duration of a consulting project?
IT Consulting.text: We vary from 2 weeks for quick diagnostics to 6 months for complete digital transformations, depending on complexity.

IT Consulting.title: How do you assess my company's digital maturity?
IT Consulting.text: We use international frameworks like COBIT and ITIL to evaluate processes, people, technology, and governance.

IT Consulting.title: Do you offer post-consulting support?
IT Consulting.text: Yes, we provide follow-up packages for 3-12 months to ensure the implementation of recommendations.

Digital Marketing Agency.title: What digital channels do you recommend for my business?
Digital Marketing Agency.text: We analyze your target audience to recommend the ideal combination of SEO, paid media, social media, and email marketing.

Digital Marketing Agency.title: How do you measure the ROI of campaigns?
Digital Marketing Agency.text: We use analytics tools with multi-channel attribution and custom reports that show the return on investment.

Digital Marketing Agency.title: What is the timeline to see results?
Digital Marketing Agency.text: SEO takes 3-6 months, while paid campaigns show results in 30-60 days, depending on the budget.

IT Security and Investments.title: What are the main risks you identify?
IT Security and Investments.text: We assess technical vulnerabilities, process failures, and human risks, prioritizing by potential business impact.

IT Security and Investments.title: How do you implement security policies?
IT Security and Investments.text: We develop custom standards, training, and continuous monitoring systems tailored to your operations.

IT Security and Investments.title: Do you meet LGPD requirements?
IT Security and Investments.text: Yes, our projects include data mapping, impact reports, and implementation of specific controls.

Digital Market Research.title: What methodologies do you use?
Digital Market Research.text: We combine quantitative research (surveys, analytics) with qualitative (interviews, focus groups) for comprehensive insights.

Digital Market Research.title: How do you ensure data representativeness?
Digital Market Research.text: We use statistical sampling techniques and cross-validation with secondary sources for greater reliability.

Digital Market Research.title: Can I compare results over time?
Digital Market Research.text: Yes, we create historical databases and comparative dashboards for temporal analysis of indicators.

Digital Reporting Analysis.title: What analytics tools do you use?
Digital Reporting Analysis.text: We work with Google Analytics, Power BI, Tableau, and custom solutions according to specific needs.

Digital Reporting Analysis.title: How do you turn data into actionable insights?
Digital Reporting Analysis.text: Our analysts identify patterns, create clear visualizations, and make strategic recommendations based on the numbers.

Digital Reporting Analysis.title: How often do you update reports?
Digital Reporting Analysis.text: We offer daily, weekly, or monthly updates, with alerts for events outside the expected norm.
